items.sentence: Have you been to Boston or Chicago in the past three weeks?
Tom was foolish enough to believe everything Mary told him.
When was the last time that I spent the whole day with you?
Tom already knows that Mary doesn\'t plan to be here today.
I think you already have enough money to buy what you need.
He couldn\'t sleep because of the noise outside his window.
He stayed home from school because he wasn\'t feeling well.
He\'s racking his brains about how to deal with the matter.
I tried to give her some money, but she wouldn\'t take any.
I used to think it didn\'t really matter what I fed my dog.
